data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Pasco, Peru know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pasco, Peru

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Pasco, Peru to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 6 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Pasco to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Pasco, Peru.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Asheninka, Pajonal people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Asheninka, Pajonal people know you.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Pasco, Peru to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Pasco, Peru that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, bring yourself glory in Pasco. Through your servants plant 55 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

location.name: Pasco
location.cities_list: Cerro de Pasco, Chaupimarca, Yanacancha, Oxapampa, Villa Rica
location.cities_list_w_pop: Cerro de Pasco (78,910), Chaupimarca (28,666), Yanacancha (24,105), Oxapampa (12,000), Villa Rica (7,448)
